short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays page load time and resource sizes in the toolbar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension measures page load time and displays it in the toolbar. 

Features
- Show Load Timimgs
- Show Load Resource Sizes
- Show Load Historical Data
